ViewObject.Name: XxcsoSpDecisionSummaryVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT (SELECT DECODE(xsdc.customer_id ,NULL, xsdc.party_name ,xcav.party_name ) FROM xxcso_sp_decision_custs xsdc ,xxcso_cust_accounts_v xcav WHERE xsdc.sp_decision_header_id = xsdh.sp_decision_header_id AND xsdc.sp_decision_customer_class = '1' AND xcav.cust_account_id(+) = xsdc.customer_id ) party_name ,xsdh.sp_decision_number ,(SELECT xev.full_name FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev WHERE xev.employee_number = xsdh.application_code ) full_name ,xsdh.application_date ,xsdh.approval_complete_date ,xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_lookup_meaning( 'XXCSO1_SP_STATUS_CD' ,xsdh.status ,TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) ) status_name ,xsdh.sp_decision_header_id FROM xxcso_sp_decision_headers xsdh ,(SELECT :1 search_class ,:2 app_base_code ,:3 app_user_code ,:4 app_start_date ,:5 app_end_date ,:6 status ,:7 sp_decision_number ,:8 cust_account_id FROM DUAL ) criteria WHERE ( ( (criteria.search_class = '1') AND ( ( ( (criteria.app_user_code IS NOT NULL) AND ( ( (criteria.app_user_code = (SELECT xev.employee_number FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev WHERE xev.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) AND (xsdh.application_code = criteria.app_user_code) ) OR ( (criteria.app_user_code <> (SELECT xev.employee_number FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev WHERE xev.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) AND (xsdh.app_base_code = criteria.app_base_code) AND (xsdh.application_code = criteria.app_user_code) ) ) ) OR ( (criteria.app_user_code IS NULL) AND ( (xsdh.app_base_code = criteria.app_base_code) OR ( EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev WHERE xev.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xev.employee_number = xsdh.application_code AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) ) ) ) OR ( EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM xxcso_sp_decision_custs xsdc ,xxcso_cust_accounts_v xcav WHERE xsdc.sp_decision_header_id = xsdh.sp_decision_header_id AND xsdc.sp_decision_customer_class = '1' AND xcav.cust_account_id = xsdc.customer_id AND xcav.sale_base_code = criteria.app_base_code AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) ) ) OR ( (criteria.search_class = '2') AND ( ( EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev ,xxcso_sp_decision_sends xsds WHERE xev.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xsds.approve_code = xev.employee_number AND xsds.sp_decision_header_id = xsdh.sp_decision_header_id AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) OR ( xsdh.application_code = (SELECT xev.employee_number FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev WHERE xev.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) ) ) ) AND ( ( (criteria.app_user_code IS NOT NULL) AND ( xsdh.application_code = criteria.app_user_code ) ) OR ( (criteria.app_user_code IS NULL) ) ) AND ( ( (criteria.app_start_date IS NOT NULL) AND ( xsdh.application_date >= criteria.app_start_date ) ) OR ( (criteria.app_start_date IS NULL) ) ) AND ( ( (criteria.app_end_date IS NOT NULL) AND ( xsdh.application_date <= criteria.app_end_date ) ) OR ( (criteria.app_end_date IS NULL) ) ) AND ( ( (criteria.status IS NOT NULL) AND ( xsdh.status = criteria.status ) ) OR ( (criteria.status IS NULL) ) ) AND ( ( (criteria.sp_decision_number IS NOT NULL) AND ( xsdh.sp_decision_number LIKE criteria.sp_decision_number ) ) OR ( (criteria.sp_decision_number IS NULL) ) ) AND ( ( (criteria.cust_account_id IS NOT NULL) AND ( EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM xxcso_sp_decision_custs xsdc WHERE xsdc.sp_decision_header_id = xsdh.sp_decision_header_id AND xsdc.sp_decision_customer_class = '1' AND xsdc.customer_id = criteria.cust_account_id AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) ) OR ( (criteria.cust_account_id IS NULL) ) )
